reviewText: Overall I would recommend this course if you're interested in learning about OpenShift. The main concepts are well explained and shown in practice. However, it's a pity that Red Hat didn't test this course as there are quite evident mistakes in tests, and the handbook to which the instructor references is currently not available in course materials
Great course to start with openshift.

I liked the full length extension of this course on kubernetes topics and also on Openshift container platform. The self-paced and bring your own computer approach is excellent in this specialization.Thanks Red Hat and Coursera for making this opportunity available to everybody!Regards,Harold.
